name: 1 Hour Massage
description:
Why a Massage can benefit you?

Massage is not just for the sporting population, these benefits are great for everyone; from the young to the elderly; the athlete to the business person, the chronically ill to the stressed out full-time parents.

Itâ€™s official, us Brits work longer hours than our European counterparts. These long days of sitting at a desk, lifting heavy objects and generally working hard can cause havoc with your body. 
STAR Injury Clinic wants you to enjoy your life in comfort, and is offering a 24hour massage service right to your door; saving you going through any stresses of transport.

A sports massage can hold many benefits to the whole body. It not only leaves you feeling good and relieve you of those aches, pains and stubborn knots; it can clinically reduce heart rate, reduce blood pressure, reduce inflammation, increase blood circulation, reduce muscle tension, improve flexibility and relieve pain; all in all providing a very relaxing experience.
A sports massage can help re-align muscle fibres to allow the body to work efficiently, and therefore reduce the risk of injury.
